extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Collect one of each of the 5 Commander 2021 decks themed around Strixhaven: School of Mages.

KEY PRODUCT FEATURES

• 100-card ready-to-play Strixhaven STX Commander deck from each school (2 foil, 98 nonfoil cards)
• 1 foil etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker and deck box
• 17 Magic cards make their debut
• Reduced-plastic packaging
• Choose your college at the most prestigious university for magical learning in MTG's Multiverse

CONTENTS

Welcome to Strixhaven, the most prestigious university for magical learning in Magic’s Multiverse. Join your fellow students in the colleges of Silverquill, Prismari, Witherbloom, Lorehold, and Quandrix and battle it out with this set of 5 Strixhaven Commander decks.

Each Strixhaven: School of Mages Commander Deck set of five includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards from each college (2 foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil etched Display Commander, 10 double-sided tokens, 1 life tracker, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), and 1 reference card, all in reduced-plastic packaging.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
KEY PRODUCT FEATURES

• 100-card ready-to-play Strixhaven (STX) Commander deck (2 foil, 98 nonfoil cards)
• 1 foil etched Display Commander
• 10 double-sided tokens + life tracker and deck box
• 17 Magic cards make their debut
• Reduced-plastic packaging — Minimal Packaging version does not contain punch-out counters or divider.
• Choose your college at the most prestigious university for magical learning in MTG's Multiverse
• Join Lorehold College to excavate an army of powerful artifacts

CONTENTS

Welcome to Strixhaven, the most prestigious university for magical learning in Magic’s Multiverse. Join your fellow students in the college of Lorehold and battle it out with this Red-White Strixhaven Commander deck.

The Lorehold Strixhaven: School of Mages Commander Deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 foil, 98 nonfoil), 1 foil etched Display Commander, 10 double-sided tokens, 1 life tracker, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), and 1 reference card, all in reduced-plastic packaging.
